name: QuoterV2
description: Provides quotes for swaps. These functions are not gas efficient and should _not_ be called on chain. Instead, optimistically execute the swap and check the amounts in the callback. Allows getting the expected amount out or amount in for a given swap without executing the swap.

functionDecorators.name: quoteExactInput
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount out received for a given exact input swap without executing the swap.

parameterDecorators.name: path
parameterDecorators.description: The path of the swap, i.e. each token pair and the pool fee.

parameterDecorators.name: amountIn
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the first token to swap.

returnDecorators.name: amountOut
returnDecorators.description: The amount of the last token that would be received.

returnDecorators.name: sqrtPriceX96AfterList
returnDecorators.description: List of the sqrt price after the swap for each pool in the path.

returnDecorators.name: initializedTicksCrossedList
returnDecorators.description: List of the initialized ticks that the swap crossed for each pool in the path.

returnDecorators.name: gasEstimate
returnDecorators.description: The estimate of the gas that the swap consumes.

functionDecorators.name: quoteExactInputSingle
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount out received for a given exact input but for a swap of a single pool.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The params for the quote, encoded as `QuoteExactInputSingleParams` tokenIn The token being swapped in tokenOut The token being swapped out fee The fee of the token pool to consider for the pair amountIn The desired input amount sqrtPriceLimitX96 The price limit of the pool that cannot be exceeded by the swap.

returnDecorators.name: amountOut
returnDecorators.description: The amount of `tokenOut` that would be received.

returnDecorators.name: sqrtPriceX96After
returnDecorators.description: The sqrt price of the pool after the swap.

returnDecorators.name: initializedTicksCrossed
returnDecorators.description: The number of initialized ticks that the swap crossed.

returnDecorators.name: gasEstimate
returnDecorators.description: The estimate of the gas that the swap consumes.

functionDecorators.name: quoteExactOutput
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount in required for a given exact output swap without executing the swap.

parameterDecorators.name: path
parameterDecorators.description: The path of the swap, i.e. each token pair and the pool fee. Path must be provided in reverse order.

parameterDecorators.name: amountOut
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the last token to receive.

returnDecorators.name: amountIn
returnDecorators.description: The amount of first token required to be paid.

returnDecorators.name: sqrtPriceX96AfterList
returnDecorators.description: List of the sqrt price after the swap for each pool in the path.

returnDecorators.name: initializedTicksCrossedList
returnDecorators.description: List of the initialized ticks that the swap crossed for each pool in the path.

returnDecorators.name: gasEstimate
returnDecorators.description: The estimate of the gas that the swap consumes.

functionDecorators.name: quoteExactOutputSingle
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount in required to receive the given exact output amount but for a swap of a single pool.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The params for the quote, encoded as `QuoteExactOutputSingleParams` tokenIn The token being swapped in tokenOut The token being swapped out fee The fee of the token pool to consider for the pair amountOut The desired output amount sqrtPriceLimitX96 The price limit of the pool that cannot be exceeded by the swap.

returnDecorators.name: amountIn
returnDecorators.description: The amount required as the input for the swap in order to receive `amountOut`.

returnDecorators.name: sqrtPriceX96After
returnDecorators.description: The sqrt price of the pool after the swap.

returnDecorators.name: initializedTicksCrossed
returnDecorators.description: The number of initialized ticks that the swap crossed.

returnDecorators.name: gasEstimate
returnDecorators.description: The estimate of the gas that the swap consumes.

functionDecorators.name: uniswapV3SwapCallback
functionDecorators.description: Called to `msg.sender` after executing a swap via IUniswapV3Pool#swap. In the implementation you must pay the pool tokens owed for the swap. The caller of this method must be checked to be a UniswapV3Pool deployed by the canonical UniswapV3Factory. amount0Delta and amount1Delta can both be 0 if no tokens were swapped.

parameterDecorators.name: amount0Delta
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of token0 that was sent (negative) or must be received (positive) by the pool by the end of the swap. If positive, the callback must send that amount of token0 to the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: amount1Delta
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of token1 that was sent (negative) or must be received (positive) by the pool by the end of the swap. If positive, the callback must send that amount of token1 to the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Any data passed through by the caller via the IUniswapV3PoolActions#swap call.
